long_description: The SMC Endeez Rope End-icators give you a quick way to identify the ends of your climbing rope while you're rappelling, belaying, climbing or handling the rope. Use the Endeez as back-up knots when you're rappelling and belaying. Simply slide the Endeez on your rope ends and secure them as directed. SMC Endeez Rope Endi-cators are not intended to catch a fall. Small size fits ropes from 7.5mm - 9.2mm in diameter; medium size fits ropes from 9.2mm - 10.4mm in diameter.
short_description: The SMC Endeez Rope End-icators give you a quick way to identify the ends of your climbing rope while you're rappelling, belaying, climbing or handling the rope.
